comment: Value of description binder ` D ` for a single-valued class expression ` C ( y ) ` (as in e.g. ~ reusv2 ). Special case of ~ riota2f . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.)
